Student of interior design department

Wu Yuqin

I used to be an interior design student and studied in Oriental Design University for two years. I learned AutoCAD and various interior decoration materials. This learning experience enables me to better understand the sense of space and design. I learned a lot and found myself more interested in product design, so I came here.

Student of Product Innovation Design

Wu Yuqin

I'm from the department of Product design. students I have a professional product design background and the ability of interaction and interface design. Not only do I have innovation The eye. But also familiar with the ability to use design-related software. I can work independently and work in a team.
